Summary: This is a completely NO FRILLS Motel.  There is NO POOL, no breakfast, nothing!  The beds were absolutely horrible! Definitely not what you want after a day at Disney.  First room had peeling paint, and a warm fridge.  Got moved to a different room and that fridge froze everything!  The mattress felt more like a broken down box spring.  The floor may have been more comfortable.  There are people who seem to be long term residents and they have loud motorcycles that were revving up at 7 am every morning!  I should have never booked this place and will spend more money next time to get a better place to stay.  You should do the same!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for commenting. I'm sorry our hotel did not meet your expectations. We take great pride in this hotel and in providing the best possible service to guests. I regret that we did not meet your needs in every way and hope you will give us another chance to satisfy you in the future. We take serving guests very seriously.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my family, with two kids. Even though Disney isn't open, we enjoyed Downtown Disney nearby. The staff are nice and polite. Rooms are clean. Very convenient location to Disney area. Needed a break without breaking the bank.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent stay at our property.  Glad to note that you had a nice experience. We will take your comments for further improvement.  It is our privilege to serve clients like you. Reviews from guests like you motivate us further. Please do visit us again,  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: I was just in town for a few days visiting family members and found this property. It was clean, affordable, and in a convenient location. The staff members were very helpful, both the manager and desk clerk Valeria were able to check me in quickly. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family (especially for Disney trips!).
Manager Response: Hello Karishma,  Thank you so much for staying with us and the wonderful feedback. Your generosity in appreciating our hotel staff and the dedicated services is very much encouraging.  It is our privilege to host guests like you, who makes us run that extra mile towards guest satisfaction. Guests like you are the real ambassadors for our hotel. We will be really excited to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff with Clean Rooms Located in a Convenient Location
Summary: I flew into town on a last-minute business trip and needed a room for one night. Was able to quickly book online at a reasonable price considering the circumstances. Upon arrival was had a no-hassle check-in to the very clean and renovated room. The staff was very friendly and respectful. Definitely enjoyed my stay!
Manager Response: Hello Viren,  Thank you for your exceptional rating and review.  We are glad that you had a great stay and loved the staff service.  It is true that our staff put their heart completely into what they do for the guests and we are happy that they could win your trust. We will definitely pass your lovely message to them. We thank you for your kind words once more and look forward eagerly to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Hotel Manager

Summary: The place was clean. The desk staff very courteous and helpful. Location was convenient to the convention center. The price wasn't inexpensive but it was the least expensive one of our choices. It has fake hardwood floors instead of obnoxious dirty carpet and they were clean. This was the most bareboned motel room I have ever stayed out. It was like Motel 6 in the 60s (I stayed at one then and didn't like it for the same reasons I'm putting down here). There was no box of tissues, no shampoo or lotion. There was no radio/alarm clock (I like it because when you wake up in the middle of the night, you can see what time it is). There were no lamps. If you are reading in bed, you have to get out, go to the door to turn off the lights and then stumble back to your bed. The lock that
Room tip: There are no views or quiet rooms.
Manager Response: Hello Michel G,  Thanks for your stay at the Motel 6 Anaheim, CA - Convention Center. I appreciate your feedback and telling us the positive and negative sides of your stay.  We shall work further to improve the amenities and hospitality based on your observations. Hope to welcome you again soon,  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Drove in from Las Vegas, get checked into a dirty room. It is literally the bare essentials. Towel, bed, tv. No hair dryer, no shampoos, no toilet paper, no wifi. Woke up to have a shower and was greeted by a giant cockroach in the tub. You can hear everything and everyone around you in the surrounding rooms. Pay the extra money to stay somewhere decent.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you for the feedback. I am very sorry to hear that we could not meet your expectations.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for the problems you experienced while staying at our hotel.  We would like to thank you for bringing these issues to our attention so that we can resolve these problems as quickly as possible.  We shall ensure that you have an awesome stay next time.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Great price and location for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at Motel 6 on a whim - our current accommodation was in Hollywood which was a good 50min drive in either direction to Disneyland, and considering we had a 2-day ticket to the parks we decided to pack a backpack and find a cheap motel to stay for the night.  We found this motel at the last minute and so glad we chose to stay here - the room was simple but it was spacious and clean and that's all that we really needed for a good nights sleep. The aircon in the room was great and the staff member that checked us in was very polite and helpful.  The area was quite nice also - if we ever return to LA I would more than likely stay in the Anaheim area again.  Overall a good stay with a great price tag, we certainly weren't disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  It is really nice to note that you liked the stay and services at our hotel during your visit. Thanks for appreciating the room features and staff hospitality. It makes us proud to serve clients like you. We look forward to welcoming you again soon!!!  Best Regards, Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: motel 6 near the convention center and near Disney LAND
Summary: Our stay was great we got the room for three days at a good price week end and week day rate.motel still under remodel so there are a few things that need to be done but when it is finished it will look good
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  It is really nice to note that you liked the stay and services at our hotel during your visit. Thanks for appreciating the room features and staff hospitality. It makes us proud to serve clients like you. We look forward to welcoming you again soon!!!  Best Regards, Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE! UNSAFE AND MOTEL 6 DONT LISTEN TO COMPLAINTS
Summary: This motel is absolutely disgusting. Don't put yourself through what we had to endure. First room the aircon flooded our room. Room we were moved to after being told we couldn’t have a refund the air con didn’t work in and it was stifling. The tap wasn’t fixed to the sink, the floor boards were coming up and trapped your feet and the pictures that had obviously been on the wall left holes. There are huge black cables hanging from the walls outside the rooms that children can easily touch. Reception was also impossible to find due to building work and the receptionist was young and inexperienced. No one cares if you're unhappy. People had things stolen from their rooms during our stay and there are nails coming from the walls where they've taken pictures downd and left the nails
Room tip: All rooms are noisy and dirty- don't stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay. Allow me to apologize on behalf of the entire hotel for failing to meet your expectations with housekeeping and maintenance services. I have shared your feedback with the entire staff to ensure we handle these issues differently in the future. Customer satisfaction is our main goal and we would love for you to come back again in the future to allow us another opportunity to create a better impression and show that changes have been made.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager
